hero.seo_description: Full Stack Developer specialized in React and Next.js. Creation of innovative, high-performance, and SEO-optimized web applications to propel your project or business.
hero.hero_description: Propel your project or business with custom-made, ultra-performant, and SEO-optimized web solutions. As a Full Stack expert specialized in React and Next.js, I transform your ideas into complete digital experiences, from front-end to back-end. Whether you're an ambitious individual or a growing business, I create web applications, CRMs, dashboards, and robust APIs that drive your growth and retain your users. Discover how my Full Stack expertise can revolutionize your online presence and optimize your internal processes.

about.subtitle: Your Web Development Partner
about.title: Full Stack Expertise for Your Digital Success
about.description: As a freelance Full Stack developer specialized in React and Next.js, I am your strategic partner for digital dominance. My holistic approach ensures robust, scalable, and SEO-optimized web applications, from back-end architecture to user interface. Together, let's transform your challenges into growth opportunities and create an online presence that captivates your audience, boosts your conversions, and retains your customers. Ready to outperform your competitors?

services.subtitle: Services
services.title: Custom Full Stack Web Solutions
services.description: Transform your ideas into digital reality with my comprehensive web development services. From design to production, I guide you in creating innovative, high-performance, and scalable web solutions.

servicesList.title: Advanced Front-End Development
servicesList.generalDescription: Create modern, responsive, and SEO-optimized user interfaces with the latest front-end technologies.

detailedDescription.title: React & Next.js Applications
detailedDescription.description: Development of high-performance and SEO-friendly web applications with React and Next.js, using SSR and SSG for an optimal user experience.

detailedDescription.title: Responsive Interfaces
detailedDescription.description: Creation of adaptive interfaces with Tailwind CSS and SASS, ensuring a consistent user experience across all devices.

detailedDescription.title: Performance Optimization
detailedDescription.description: Improvement of loading times and application interactivity through advanced front-end optimization techniques.

detailedDescription.title: API Integration & State Management
detailedDescription.description: Efficient integration of RESTful and GraphQL APIs, advanced state management with Redux or Context API for robust and scalable applications.

servicesList.title: Robust Back-End Development
servicesList.generalDescription: Build solid and scalable back-end architectures to support your web and mobile applications.

detailedDescription.title: RESTful & GraphQL APIs
detailedDescription.description: Design and development of high-performance and secure APIs with Node.js, Express, and Apollo Server for GraphQL.

detailedDescription.title: Databases & ORM
detailedDescription.description: Efficient data management with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and use of ORMs like Mongoose or Prisma for optimal abstraction.

detailedDescription.title: Authentication & Security
detailedDescription.description: Implementation of robust authentication systems (JWT, OAuth) and securing applications against common vulnerabilities.

detailedDescription.title: Serverless & Cloud Functions
detailedDescription.description: Development of serverless functions and deployment on cloud platforms like Vercel, AWS Lambda, or Google Cloud Functions.

servicesList.title: Comprehensive Full Stack Solutions
servicesList.generalDescription: End-to-end development of complex web applications, from front-end to back-end, including deployment and maintenance.

detailedDescription.title: Progressive Web Applications (PWA)
detailedDescription.description: Creation of progressive web applications offering a near-native experience on all devices.

detailedDescription.title: E-commerce & Payment Systems
detailedDescription.description: Development of custom e-commerce platforms with integration of secure payment systems (Stripe, PayPal).

detailedDescription.title: Headless CMS
detailedDescription.description: Implementation of headless CMS like Strapi or Contentful for flexible and decoupled content management.

detailedDescription.title: Dashboards & Analytics
detailedDescription.description: Creation of interactive dashboards and data analysis systems to visualize important KPIs for your business.

portfolio.subtitle: Portfolio
portfolio.title: Recent Projects
portfolio.description: Explore my gallery of diverse projects to see innovative solutions tailored to unique business needs. Each project showcases my ability to adapt to different sectors and requirements, demonstrating skills in both design and development.

newsletter.title: Ready to Bring Your Digital Project to Life?
newsletter.description: Whether you have a precise idea or are seeking advice for your online presence, I'm here to help. Let's discuss your project and see how my Full Stack development services can meet your specific needs.

metadata.title: About Patrick Bartosik - Innovative Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Discover the journey and expertise of Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack developer passionate about React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Dive into his experiences and skills to see how he transforms ideas into high-performing digital solutions. With a focus on SEO, performance, and user experience, Patrick ensures that each project is not only visually impressive but also technically superior.

aboutMe.titleMain: A Passionate Developer at Your Service
aboutMe.name: Patrick Bartosik
introduction: Welcome to my digital universe! I'm Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences. Specialized in React and Next.js, I transform ambitious ideas into high-performing and innovative web applications.

My journey is marked by overcoming challenges and providing creative solutions to complex problems. From designing intuitive user interfaces to architecting robust back-end systems, each project is an opportunity for me to push the boundaries of web innovation.

What sets me apart? A holistic approach to web development, combining technical expertise, creativity, and a deep understanding of business needs. I don't just code; I build solutions that propel your business towards digital success.

My skills cover a wide spectrum: from front-end development with React and Next.js to creating high-performance APIs, including SEO optimization and integration of complex systems. Every line of code I write aims to create tangible value for your project.

Collaborating with me means opting for a partnership where your vision is at the heart of every technical decision. Together, we'll transform your ideas into digital realities that will captivate your users and stimulate your growth.
aboutMe.callToAction: Ready to Revolutionize Your Web Presence?

education.title: Baccalaureate in Science and Technology for Industry and Sustainable Development (STI2D)
education.location: Jules Richard General and Technological High School
education.description: French Baccalaureate with a specialization in science and technology, preparing for higher education in technological fields.

education.title: Bachelor's in Coding and Digital Innovation
education.location: IIM - School of Internet and Multimedia, Paris
education.description: Specialized degree in coding and digital innovation, acquiring practical skills and theoretical knowledge in digital technologies and software development.

education.title: Master's in Web and Mobile Engineering
education.location: IIM - School of Internet and Multimedia, Paris
education.description: Currently pursuing a Master's in Web and Mobile Engineering, focusing on advanced concepts in mobile solutions, web technologies, and application development.

professional.title: Full Stack IT Developer (Apprenticeship)
professional.description: As an IT developer, I am dedicated to creating robust web interfaces using Angular for one of the world's largest post-trade service providers. I contribute to improving critical financial systems, focusing on performance, security, and user experience.

professional.title: Full Stack Developer (Apprenticeship)
professional.description: First significant professional experience where I delved into the world of cutting-edge e-commerce. As a key member of a dynamic team, I took on the challenge of quickly mastering the Shopify ecosystem and modern web technologies. I designed and developed high-performance and innovative online stores, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Liquid for the front-end, as well as Node.js and TypeScript for the back-end. This experience allowed me to develop solid expertise in integrating REST and GraphQL APIs, while constantly adapting to the latest e-commerce trends.

professional.title: Full Stack Developer (Internship)
professional.description: Intensive internship that consolidated and deepened the skills acquired during my academic journey. I had the opportunity to work on complex e-commerce projects, honing my skills in front-end and back-end development. This experience allowed me to gain autonomy and bring innovative solutions to technical challenges encountered, while closely collaborating with the development team.

professional.title: Front-end Developer (Academic Project)
professional.description: As part of an ambitious academic project, I led the front-end development of a showcase website for an automotive garage. Using SCSS and Twig, I created a modern and responsive user interface, integrated with a Symfony back-end. This project allowed me to put into practice my skills in UX/UI design and SEO optimization, particularly through the implementation of Google Business.

professional.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
professional.description: Alongside my studies and corporate experiences, I run a freelance activity where I design and develop custom web solutions for various clients. This experience has allowed me to refine my skills in project management, client relations, and full stack development, while staying at the forefront of the latest web technologies.

skills.title: Expertise in Modern Technologies for Digital Transformation
skills.coreTechnologiesDescription: Mastery of the most recent and high-performing technologies, ideal for companies aiming for a complete modernization of their digital ecosystem.
skills.otherTechnologiesDescription: Varied skills in a wide range of modern tools, allowing seamless integration with your existing systems and rapid adaptation to your specific needs.
skills.languagesDescription: Ability to collaborate effectively in an international environment, facilitating coordination with teams and clients worldwide.
skills.softSkillsDescription: Essential qualities for successfully carrying out digital transformation projects, ensuring effective collaboration, and stimulating innovation within your company.

metadata.title: Web Development Portfolio - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Explore the portfolio of Patrick Bartosik, a Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Discover a showcase of innovative web projects that combine aesthetics and functionality.

header.title: Explore All My Projects
header.description: Discover in this gallery all the projects I have worked on. From e-commerce projects to school and personal projects, you will find a wide range of web applications that I have developed or contributed to.

metadata.title: Premium Full Stack Web Development Services
metadata.description: Provide your business with an exceptional online presence through customized web solutions. Expert in React, Next.js, AWS, and more for high-performing and scalable applications.

servicesPage.titleMain: Propel Your Business into the Digital Era
servicesPage.introduction: As an experienced full-stack developer, I offer comprehensive and tailor-made web services to meet your company's unique challenges. Whether you're an ambitious startup or an established enterprise, my solutions are designed to give you a competitive edge in today's digital world.
servicesPage.imageAlt: Illustration of full-stack web development services

servicesList.title: Full-Stack Development
servicesList.generalDescription:
I offer a complete full-stack development service to create high-performance, intuitive web applications perfectly adapted to the specific needs of your business. By combining my front-end skills with React.js and Next.js, I design modern and responsive user interfaces that provide an exceptional user experience. On the back-end, my expertise in various server technologies allows me to build robust, secure, and scalable systems, ensuring the reliability and performance of your applications.

I manage the entire development process, from initial design to production deployment, including rigorous unit testing to guarantee code quality. My personalized approach enables me to deeply understand your business objectives, allowing me to develop custom solutions that not only meet but exceed your expectations. Additionally, I stay constantly updated with the latest technological trends to integrate innovative features that will give your company a significant competitive advantage.

detailedDescription.title: Creation of Customized Web Applications
detailedDescription.description: I develop tailor-made web applications that specifically address the unique needs of your business. By closely collaborating with you, I ensure that each feature aligns with your business objectives, offering a solution that maximizes value for your organization and clients. My agile development process guarantees flexibility and quick adaptation to changes, ensuring the success of your project.

detailedDescription.title: Mastery of Modern Technologies
detailedDescription.description: I utilize the latest technologies like React.js, Next.js, and AWS to build robust and scalable solutions. This expertise allows me to create high-performance applications that can evolve with your business, while ensuring simplified maintenance and a long product lifespan. Using these modern technologies also ensures better security and an enhanced user experience.

detailedDescription.title: Rigorous Unit Testing
detailedDescription.description: Code quality is an absolute priority. I implement rigorous unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of your applications. This reduces the risks of bugs and malfunctions, guaranteeing a smooth and uninterrupted user experience. Unit testing also facilitates future maintenance and the addition of new features.

detailedDescription.title: Documentation and Training
detailedDescription.description: I provide comprehensive documentation and offer training sessions for you and your team. This allows you to deeply understand the developed tools, facilitating their adoption and ensuring effective long-term use. The documentation includes user guides, installation manuals, and detailed technical references.

servicesList.title: Customized E-commerce Solutions
servicesList.generalDescription:
Boost your online sales with a high-performing, secure e-commerce store perfectly adapted to your brand. Specializing in Shopify, Strapi, Stripe, and Lemon, I create online shopping platforms that combine attractive aesthetics, smooth user experience, and advanced features to maximize your conversion rate. I understand that every business is unique, which is why I offer tailor-made solutions that reflect your identity and meet the specific needs of your target clientele.

From design conception to the integration of secure payment systems, including optimization for search engines, every aspect is carefully thought out to propel your online store to the top of the market. My client-centered approach ensures that your e-commerce platform not only offers exceptional features but also provides a memorable shopping experience that retains your customers and drives your business growth.

detailedDescription.title: Attractive and Functional Design
detailedDescription.description: I design online stores with an intuitive user interface and a design that faithfully reflects your brand. The goal is to engage your visitors from the first click, offering smooth navigation that facilitates product discovery and purchase. Every design element is optimized to encourage conversions and improve customer satisfaction.

detailedDescription.title: Integration of Secure Payment Solutions
detailedDescription.description: I implement reliable and secure payment systems, notably with Stripe, to facilitate transactions and strengthen customer trust. Whether it's credit cards, PayPal, or other payment methods, I ensure the process is simple, fast, and secure, helping to reduce cart abandonment rates.

detailedDescription.title: Efficient Stock and Order Management
detailedDescription.description: I deploy advanced tools to efficiently manage your stock, orders, and shipments. This allows you to monitor your operations in real-time, optimize resource management, and improve customer satisfaction through seamless logistics. Notification systems and reporting help you make informed decisions about your inventory.

servicesList.title: CMS Development and Integration
servicesList.generalDescription:
Manage your online content effectively with customized Content Management Systems (CMS). Specializing in WordPress and Strapi, I create flexible, secure, and easy-to-administer websites that allow you to update your content without requiring deep technical skills. Whether you need a showcase site, a professional blog, or an information portal, I develop solutions tailored to your specific needs.

Emphasis is placed on user-friendliness, performance, and security, so you can focus on creating quality content for your audience. I also ensure that your site is optimized for SEO, improving your online visibility and attracting qualified traffic to your platform.

detailedDescription.title: Theme Customization
detailedDescription.description: I customize existing themes or create new ones to meet your company's specific needs while ensuring an intuitive user interface. This customization ensures your site is unique and aligned with your brand image, offering a memorable experience to your visitors.

detailedDescription.title: Optimal Security and Performance
detailedDescription.description: I implement advanced security measures such as firewalls, SSL certificates, and automated backup systems to protect your site from potential threats. Additionally, I optimize performance by improving loading times and ensuring smooth navigation, which is essential for retaining visitors and improving your SEO ranking.

detailedDescription.title: CMS Management Training
detailedDescription.description: I offer personalized training so you can manage and update your content independently. Training sessions are adapted to your skill level and include practical guides, allowing you to make the most of your CMS without constantly relying on a developer.

detailedDescription.title: Integration of Advanced Features
detailedDescription.description: I add custom features such as blogs, forums, photo galleries, or information portals to enrich your site. These additions increase visitor engagement and offer more value to your audience while differentiating your site from the competition.

servicesList.title: Cloud Architecture and Deployment
servicesList.generalDescription:
Adopt the cloud to benefit from flexibility, scalability, and reduced infrastructure costs. Specializing in AWS, I design secure and high-performing cloud architectures for your applications, helping you migrate existing systems or develop new cloud-native applications. I ensure your cloud infrastructure is optimized for your current needs while being ready to evolve with your business.

Furthermore, I ensure the efficient deployment of your applications with automated processes, facilitating updates and maintenance. My expertise guarantees you get the most out of cloud technologies to strengthen your market position by improving the availability, performance, and security of your online services.

detailedDescription.title: Migration to the Cloud
detailedDescription.description: I assist you in migrating your existing applications to the cloud, reducing infrastructure costs and improving scalability. This transition is carried out while minimizing service interruptions and ensuring operational continuity, optimizing resources for maximum performance.

detailedDescription.title: Design of Cloud-Native Architectures
detailedDescription.description: I develop cloud-native applications using AWS services for optimal performance and reliability. This approach ensures your applications are designed to fully leverage cloud advantages like auto-scaling, fault tolerance, and global distribution.

detailedDescription.title: Automated Deployment
detailedDescription.description: I set up automated deployment processes using tools like AWS CodePipeline and CodeDeploy. This facilitates updates, reduces human errors, and speeds up time-to-market while ensuring efficient continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD).

detailedDescription.title: Security and Compliance
detailedDescription.description: I implement robust security protocols, including data encryption, Identity and Access Management (IAM), and real-time monitoring. I also ensure your cloud infrastructure complies with current regulations like GDPR to protect sensitive data and strengthen customer trust.

servicesList.title: UI/UX Design and Integration
servicesList.generalDescription:
Create an exceptional user experience with meticulous designs and precise integration. From designing mockups to final integration, I accompany you at each step to ensure your application or website is not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and easy to use. I work closely with you to understand your vision and goals, then design interfaces that reflect your brand and captivate your target audience.

The integration of mockups is carried out with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring the final product matches the intended design exactly. My user-centered approach aims to increase engagement and customer satisfaction, which can lead to better retention and increased conversions.

detailedDescription.title: Creation of Customized Mockups
detailedDescription.description: I create mockups that reflect your vision and your users' needs, emphasizing ergonomics and aesthetics. Each element is designed to enhance the user experience and encourage engagement while adhering to current design standards and trends.

detailedDescription.title: Precise Design Integration
detailedDescription.description: I ensure faithful integration of mockups into code, guaranteeing consistency between the design and the final product. This precision avoids surprises during deployment and ensures the application functions as intended, offering an optimal user experience.

detailedDescription.title: User Experience Optimization
detailedDescription.description: I conduct in-depth analyses to improve the user experience, thereby increasing engagement and visitor satisfaction. This includes usability testing, user journey analysis, and interface adjustments based on feedback to create a smooth and intuitive interaction.

detailedDescription.title: Multi-Platform Adaptability
detailedDescription.description: I ensure your application or website functions perfectly on all types of devices and browsers. This compatibility broadens your reach and offers a consistent experience to all users, whether they use a smartphone, tablet, or desktop computer.

servicesList.title: Maintenance and Technical Support
servicesList.generalDescription:
Ensure the longevity and performance of your applications with proactive maintenance services. I offer TMA (Third-Party Application Maintenance) and TME (Third-Party Operational Maintenance) solutions to keep your systems in optimal condition. My proactive approach includes continuous performance monitoring, quick bug fixes, and regular security updates.

I work closely with you to understand your company's evolving needs, adapting maintenance services to support your growth. With responsive technical support, you can focus on your core business with peace of mind, knowing your applications are in good hands and running smoothly.

detailedDescription.title: Performance Monitoring
detailedDescription.description: I continuously monitor your applications' performance to detect and resolve issues before they affect your users. This proactive approach ensures maximum availability and a high-quality user experience, avoiding costly downtime.

detailedDescription.title: Regular Updates
detailedDescription.description: I apply security updates and functional improvements to keep your systems up to date. This includes installing the latest software patches, upgrading frameworks, and adding new features to meet your company's changing needs.

detailedDescription.title: Responsive Technical Support
detailedDescription.description: I provide quick assistance to resolve any technical issue, minimizing service interruptions. You can be assured that any difficulty will be handled efficiently and professionally, reinforcing your clients' trust in your services.

detailedDescription.title: Maintenance Reports
detailedDescription.description: I provide detailed reports on maintenance activities and your systems' performance. These reports allow you to track your applications' status, identify trends, and plan future improvements based on concrete data.

servicesList.title: Development of Customized CRMs
servicesList.generalDescription:
Optimize your customer relationship management with tailor-made CRMs. I develop solutions adapted to your processes to improve customer satisfaction, increase sales, and streamline operations. By deeply understanding your specific needs, I create a CRM that centralizes all your customer interactions, offering a 360-degree view that facilitates decision-making.

Automating repetitive tasks and integrating with your existing systems enhance your teams' efficiency. With an intuitive interface and personalized features, your new CRM will become an indispensable tool to propel your business to new heights by strengthening customer loyalty and driving growth.

detailedDescription.title: Needs Analysis
detailedDescription.description: I conduct an in-depth evaluation of your processes to design a CRM that perfectly meets your requirements. This step ensures the developed solution aligns with your commercial and operational objectives, considering the specifics of your industry.

detailedDescription.title: Integration with Existing Systems
detailedDescription.description: I ensure full compatibility and interoperability with your current tools, such as ERP systems, marketing platforms, or customer support applications, for maximum efficiency. This allows for a smooth transition and rapid adoption by your teams without disrupting operations.

detailedDescription.title: Training and Documentation
detailedDescription.description: I train your teams to use the new CRM and provide complete documentation, including user guides and tutorials. This training ensures quick mastery of the tool, maximizing its positive impact on your business and promoting widespread adoption.

detailedDescription.title: Evolution and Scalability
detailedDescription.description: I design a scalable CRM that can grow with your business and adapt to new needs. This flexibility ensures your investment remains relevant in the long term by allowing the addition of new features and the integration of emerging technologies.

servicesList.title: Documentation and Training
servicesList.generalDescription:
Maximize your teams' efficiency with clear documentation and tailored training. I create detailed guides and offer training sessions to ensure successful adoption of your tools and applications. Good documentation is essential for the maintenance and evolution of your systems, while training ensures your employees are comfortable with new technologies.

My personalized approach considers different skill levels and learning modes, ensuring each team member can effectively contribute to the success of your technological projects. I am committed to providing continuous support to answer questions and help resolve issues that may arise after training.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Documentation
detailedDescription.description: I write detailed documentation, including user guides, installation manuals, and API references. These documents serve as a reference for your teams, facilitating understanding and use of the systems and reducing the time needed to train new employees.

detailedDescription.title: Personalized Training
detailedDescription.description: I offer training sessions adapted to different skill levels, whether basic training for beginners or advanced sessions for experienced users. This approach ensures each team member can effectively use the implemented technologies, increasing overall productivity.

detailedDescription.title: Training Materials
detailedDescription.description: I provide training materials such as presentations, explanatory videos, and interactive tutorials. These resources are useful for continuous training and can be reused for onboarding new employees, ensuring consistency in learning.

detailedDescription.title: Post-Training Support
detailedDescription.description: I remain available to answer questions and help resolve issues after training. This continuous support ensures a smooth transition and optimal use of the tools, reinforcing your teams' confidence in new technologies.

servicesList.title: Email Marketing and Automation
servicesList.generalDescription:
Reach and engage your customers with effective email marketing campaigns. I use tools like Klaviyo, Brevo, and React Mailer to design, automate, and optimize your communications, increasing customer engagement and boosting sales. By combining attractive designs with advanced segmentation strategies, I create personalized campaigns that resonate with your target audience.

Automating repetitive tasks saves you time and ensures consistent communication. Additionally, performance analysis provides valuable insights to continually refine your marketing approach, maximize ROI, and strengthen customer loyalty.

detailedDescription.title: Creation of Personalized Campaigns
detailedDescription.description: I design attractive and relevant emails for your target audience using professional designs and engaging content. This helps increase open and click-through rates, maximizing campaign effectiveness and strengthening your brand's visibility.

detailedDescription.title: Task Automation
detailedDescription.description: I configure automated tasks with crons to optimize your marketing processes. This includes automatic sending of welcome emails, reminders, promotions, or post-purchase follow-ups, ensuring timely and relevant communication with your customers at each stage of the sales cycle.

detailedDescription.title: Performance Analysis
detailedDescription.description: I monitor and analyze campaign performance using key indicators like open rates, click-through rates, and conversions. Detailed reports allow you to understand what works and identify areas for improvement to optimize your marketing strategies.

detailedDescription.title: Audience Segmentation
detailedDescription.description: I manage and segment your contact lists based on various criteria such as purchase behavior, interests, or location. By precisely targeting your messages, you increase their relevance, improve engagement, and foster a more personal relationship with your customers.

servicesList.title: Development of Tools and Dashboards
servicesList.generalDescription:
Make informed decisions with customized tools and dashboards. I develop tailor-made solutions to visualize and analyze your data in real-time, offering you a clear and actionable view of your business operations. By integrating your different data sources, I create interactive dashboards that allow you to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) important to your business.

These tools are designed to be intuitive and easy to use, helping your teams make quick and informed decisions. Whether it's tracking sales, managing inventory, or marketing analysis, my solutions give you a significant competitive advantage by turning raw data into actionable insights.

detailedDescription.title: Data Visualization
detailedDescription.description: I create interactive charts and dashboards to easily interpret your data. These visualizations facilitate understanding of trends and your company's performance, enabling in-depth analysis without requiring advanced technical skills.

detailedDescription.title: Integration of Data Sources
detailedDescription.description: I connect various data sources such as internal databases, external APIs, or spreadsheets for a unified and coherent view. This integration eliminates information silos and ensures all departments work with the same up-to-date data.

detailedDescription.title: Advanced Customization
detailedDescription.description: I develop specific features to meet your unique analytical needs. This may include custom alerts, simulations, or projections, helping you anticipate challenges and seize opportunities with precision.

detailedDescription.title: Real-Time Updates
detailedDescription.description: I implement systems that reflect data in real-time, allowing you to react immediately to market changes or company performance. This responsiveness is crucial for making effective strategic decisions and maintaining your competitive advantage.

servicesList.title: Website Redesign and Audits
servicesList.generalDescription:
Modernize your online presence with a website redesign or identify improvement points through a comprehensive audit. I help you enhance your site's aesthetics, functionality, and performance to better meet user expectations and current market demands. A redesign can revitalize your brand image, improve user experience, and increase your online visibility.

The audit, meanwhile, provides a detailed analysis of your site's current state, identifying strengths, weaknesses, and opportunities. Together, we develop a strategy to optimize your website, strengthening your competitive position and driving your business's growth.

detailedDescription.title: Complete Site Analysis
detailedDescription.description: I conduct an assessment of your site's current performance, including speed, security, SEO, and user experience analysis. This in-depth analysis identifies obstacles that may prevent your site from reaching its full potential and proposes targeted solutions.

detailedDescription.title: Modernized Design
detailedDescription.description: I update your site's aesthetics to reflect current trends and your brand image. A modern and attractive design attracts more visitors, improves your company's perception, and can lead to increased conversions and customer retention.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Optimization
detailedDescription.description: I improve loading speed, security, and mobile compatibility of your site. These optimizations are essential to offer a better user experience, reduce bounce rates, and improve your ranking in search engines.

detailedDescription.title: User Experience Improvement
detailedDescription.description: I reconfigure site navigation and structure for a better user experience. Intuitive navigation and clear information architecture retain visitors longer and encourage them to explore more of your content, which can increase conversion opportunities.

metadata.title: General Terms of Use - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the General Terms of Use for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover how your access and use of the site are governed and what responsibilities you have as a user.

legalText: General Terms of Use (GTU)
Article 1: Introduction

Welcome to the Patrick Bartosik website. These General Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website and its associated services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and all terms incorporated by reference. If you do not agree to all of these terms, do not use our website.
Article 2: Legal Notice

The website patrick.bartosik.fr (hereafter "the Site") is operated by Patrick Bartosik, whose registered office is located at 28bis Rue Honor Sohier, 93600 Aulnays-Sous-Bois, France, registered under the number 90093821800014.
Article 3: Website Access and Usage
The Site provides users with access to a variety of resources, including but not limited to:
- Informational content
- User interfaces
- Software tools

Access to the Site is free of charge to any user with internet access. All costs necessary for the access to services (internet access, computer equipment, etc.) are borne by the user. Access to specific services on the Site may require the user to create an account and provide certain personal information.

The Site strives to provide accurate information and updates. However, inaccuracies or omissions may occur. The operator in charge of the Site cannot be held responsible for any omission, inaccuracy, or deficiency in the update, whether caused by the Site or by third-party partners who provide this information.
Article 4: User Responsibilities

Users are responsible for the security of their account access credentials. Any usage of the site from a users account is deemed to have been used by that user. The Site reserves the right to request users to adhere to these GTU under penalty of temporary or permanent suspension of the account.

Users agree not to disrupt the operation of the service offered by www.patrickbartosik.com in any way whatsoever. In particular, users agree to refrain from posting illegal, defamatory, or pornographic messages on or through the Site.
Article 5: Intellectual Property

Content on the Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, logos, icons, and audio clips, is the property of the site operator or is used with permission of the respective owners and is subject to copyright and other intellectual property rights under national laws and international treaties.

Users may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, transmit, reuse, repost, or use the content of the Site for public or commercial purposes without the express written permission of the Site operator.
Article 6: Data Protection and Privacy
For information on how user information is collected, used, and disclosed by us in connection with your use of the Site, please consult our Privacy Policy.
Article 7: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These GTU are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. Any dispute arising from these terms or related to the use of the Site is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of France.
Article 8: Changes to the General Terms of Use

The Site reserves the right to modify the contents of these GTU at any time without prior notice. Users are encouraged to check these terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of the site after the posting of changes constitutes your binding acceptance of such changes.
Conclusion

These GTU ensure the proper and fair functioning of the Site. By accessing the Site, you signify your agreement to these GTU. If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the Privacy Policy for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover how your personal data is collected, used, and protected when you use our site.

legalText: Privacy Policy
Article 1: Preamble
This privacy policy applies to the site: Patrick Bartosik.
This privacy policy aims to expose to the users of the site:

- The manner in which their personal data are collected and processed. Should be considered as personal data all data that can identify a user. This includes first name and last name, age, postal address, email address, user's location or even his IP address;
- What rights users have regarding these data;
- Who is responsible for the processing of the collected and processed personal data;
- To whom these data are transmitted;
- Optionally, the sites policy on "cookies".
This privacy policy supplements the legal notices.
Article 2: General principles regarding data collection and processing
In accordance with the provisions of Article 5 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of user data from the site respect the following principles:

- Legality, fairness, and transparency: data can only be collected and processed with the consent of the data owner. Whenever personal data will be collected, the user will be informed that his data is being collected, and why his data is being collected;
- Limited purposes: data collection and processing are executed to meet one or more objectives specified in these terms of use;
- Minimizing the collection and processing of data: only the data necessary for the proper execution of the objectives pursued by the site are collected;

- Reduced data retention in time: data is stored for a limited period of which the user is informed. If this information cannot be communicated, the user is informed of the criteria used to determine the duration of conservation;
- Integrity and confidentiality of the collected and processed data: the data controller commits to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of the collected data.

To be lawful, and in accordance with the requirements of Article 6 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of personal data may only occur if they comply with at least one of the following conditions:
- The user has expressly consented to the processing;
- Processing is necessary for the proper performance of a contract;
- The processing meets a legal obligation;
- The processing is explained by a need linked to the protection of the vital interests of the concerned individual or another person;
- The processing can be explained by a necessity linked to the performance of a mission of public interest or that relates to the exercise of public authority;
- The processing and collection of personal data are necessary for the legitimate private interests pursued by the data controller or by a third party.
Article 3: Personal data collected and processed in the framework of site navigation
A. Data collected and processed and collection mode
The personal data collected on the Patrick Bartosik site are as follows:
- IP addresses and browser cookies.
- First name, last name, email address, telephone, and company.
These data are collected when the user performs one of the following operations on the site:
- When the user visits one of the site's pages.
- When the user uses one of the contact forms.
The data controller will keep in the computer systems of the site and under reasonable security conditions all the data collected for a duration of: 26 months.
The collection and processing of the data serve the following purposes:
- Analysis of site traffic.
- To allow recontacting the user.
B. Transmission of data to third parties
The data may be transmitted to the following third party(ies):
Google and Vercel
C. Data hosting
The Patrick Bartosik site is hosted by: Vercel, whose headquarters is located at the following address:
San Francisco in the United States.

The data collected and processed by the site are transferred to the following country(ies): France, Ireland, and the United States. This transfer of personal data outside the European Union justifies the following reasons:
Location of the headquarters of third parties.
Article 4: Data Controller
A. The data controller
The data controller for personal data is: Patrick Bartosik. He can be contacted as follows:
By email: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com
The data controller is responsible for determining the purposes and means used in the processing of personal data.
B. Obligations of the data controller

The data controller commits to protect the collected personal data, not to transmit them to third parties without the user having been informed, and to respect the purposes for which these data were collected.
The site has an SSL certificate to ensure that the information and the transfer of data passing through the site are secured.
An SSL ("Secure Socket Layer" Certificate) aims to secure the data exchanged between the user and the site.
Moreover, the data controller commits to notify the user in case of correction or deletion of the data, unless this entails for him disproportionate formalities, costs, and steps.
In the case where the integrity, confidentiality, or security of the user's personal data is compromised, the data controller commits to inform the user by any means.
Article 5: User rights
In accordance with the regulation concerning the processing of personal data, the user has the rights listed below.
In order for the data controller to comply with his request, the user is required to communicate: his first name and last name as well as his email address.
The data controller is required to respond to the user within a maximum of 30 (thirty) days.
A. Presentation of the user's rights in data collection and processing
a. Right of access, rectification, and right to erasure
The user can take knowledge, update, modify or request the deletion of data concerning him, following the procedure set out below:
The user must send an email to the personal data processing manager, specifying the subject of his request and using the contact email address provided above.
b. Right to data portability
The user has the right to request the portability of his personal data, held by the site, to another site, by complying with the following procedure:
The user must make a request for the portability of his personal data to the data controller, by sending an email to the address provided above.
c. Right to limitation and opposition of data processing

The user has the right to request the limitation or to oppose the processing of his data by the site, without the site being able to refuse, except to demonstrate legitimate and compelling reasons, which can prevail over the interests and rights and freedoms of the user.
To request the limitation of data processing or to formulate an opposition to data processing, the user must follow the following procedure:
The user must make a request for limitation to the processing of his personal data to the data controller, by sending an email to the address provided above.
d. Right not to be the subject of a decision based exclusively on an automated process

In accordance with the provisions of Regulation 2016/679, the user has the right not to be the subject of a decision based exclusively on an automated process if the decision produces legal effects concerning him, or similarly significantly affects him.
e. Right to decide the fate of data after death
It is reminded to the user that he can organize what should be the future of his data collected and processed if he dies, in accordance with Law No. 2016-1321 of October 7, 2016.
f. Right to seize the competent control authority

In the event that the data controller decides not to respond to the user's request, and the user wishes to contest this decision, or, if he thinks that one of the rights listed above is infringed, he is entitled to seize the CNIL (National Commission on Informatics and Liberty, https://www.cnil.fr) or any competent judge.
B. Personal data of minor persons
In accordance with the provisions of Article 8 of the European Regulation 2016/679 and the Data Protection Act, only minors aged 15 years or more can consent to the processing of their personal data.
If the user is a minor under 15 years old, the agreement of a legal representative will be required so that personal data can be collected and processed.
The site publisher reserves the right to verify by any means that the user is over 15 years old, or that he will have obtained the agreement of a legal representative before browsing the site.
Article 6: Use of "Cookies" files
The site may have recourse to the techniques of "cookies".
A "cookie" is a small file (less than 4 ko), stored by the site on the user's hard drive, containing information related to the user's browsing habits.
These files allow him to process statistics and traffic information, facilitate navigation and improve the service for the user's comfort.
For the use of "cookie" files involving the storage and analysis of personal data, the user's consent is necessarily asked.

This user's consent is considered valid for a duration of 13 (thirteen) months maximum. At the end of this period, the site will again ask for the user's authorization to save "cookies" files on his hard drive.
a. User's opposition to the use of "cookies" files by the site
It is brought to the user's knowledge that he can oppose the recording of these "cookies" by configuring his navigation software.
For information, the user can find at the following addresses the steps to follow in order to configure his navigation software to oppose the recording of "cookie" files:
- Chrome: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/61416?hl=en
- Firefox: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/enable-and-disable-cookies-website-preferences
- Safari: http://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/en-ww/
- Internet Explorer: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17442/windows-internet-explorer-delete-manage-cookies
- Opera: http://www.opera.com/help/tutorials/security/cookies/

In the case where the user decides to disable the "cookies" files, he may continue his navigation on the site. However, any dysfunction of the site caused by this manipulation could not be considered as being due to the site publisher.
b. Description of the "cookies" files used by the site
The site publisher draws the user's attention to the fact that the following cookies are used during his navigation:
Cookies authorized and recorded by browsers.
By browsing on the site, it is brought to the user's knowledge that "cookie" files of third parties may be recorded.
It is more particularly the following third parties:
Third parties listed in Article 3.B above.

Moreover, the site incorporates social network buttons, allowing the user to share his activity on the site. "Cookie" files of these social networks are therefore likely to be stored on the user's computer when he uses these features.

The user's attention is drawn to the fact that these sites have their own privacy policies and terms and conditions of use possibly different from the site. The site publisher invites users to consult the privacy policies and the terms and conditions of use of these sites.
Article 7: Condition of modification of the privacy policy
This privacy policy can be consulted at any time at the address indicated below:
https://Patrick.Bartosik.com/policy
The site publisher reserves the right to modify it to ensure its compliance with the law in force.
Therefore, the user is invited to come regularly consult this privacy policy to stay informed of the latest changes that will be brought to it.
It is brought to the user's knowledge that the last update of this privacy policy occurred on: 21/05/2024.
Article 8: Acceptance by the user of the privacy policy

By browsing on the site, the user attests having read and understood this privacy policy and accepts its conditions, particularly concerning the collection and processing of his personal data, as well as the use of "cookie" files.

metadata.title: Legal Notices - Patrick Bartosik
metadata.description: Read the legal notices for Patrick Bartosik's website. Discover the legal information about the site publisher, host, and terms of use.

legalText: Legal Notices

In accordance with the provisions of Articles 6-III and 19 of the Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for Confidence in the Digital Economy, known as L.C.E.N., users and visitors of Patrick Bartosik's website are hereby informed of these legal notices.

The Patrick Bartosik website is accessible at the following address: Patrick.Bartosik.fr (hereinafter "the Site"). Access and use of the Site are subject to these "Legal Notices" detailed below as well as applicable laws and/or regulations.
Connecting to, using, and accessing this Site implies full and unconditional acceptance by the user of all the provisions of these Legal Notices.
Article 1: Legal Information
Under Article 6 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, for confidence in the digital economy, this article specifies the identity of the various parties involved in its implementation and monitoring.
A. Site Publisher
The Patrick Bartosik site is published by:
Patrick Bartosik, having its registered office at the following address: 28bis rue Honor Sohier, and registered under the number: 90093821800014 - Paris.
Share capital: 1000 euros
Email address: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com
hereinafter "the Publisher"
B. Publishing Director
The Publishing Director is:
Bartosik Patrick
hereinafter "the Publishing Director"
C. Site Host
The Patrick Bartosik site is hosted by:
Vercel Inc., located at the following address: San Francisco in the United States.
hereinafter "the Host"
D. Users
All Internet users who browse, read, view, and use the Patrick Bartosik site are considered users.
hereinafter "the Users"
Article 2 - Accessibility
The Site is in principle accessible to Users 24/24h and 7/7d, except for interruption, scheduled or not, for maintenance needs or in case of force majeure.

Should access to the Site become impossible, efforts will be made to restore access as soon as possible. The Site cannot be held responsible for any damage of any nature resulting from its unavailability.
Article 3 - Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These Legal Notices are governed by French law. In case of dispute and in the absence of an amicable agreement, the dispute will be brought before the French courts in accordance with the rules of jurisdiction in force.
Article 4 - Contact

For any reporting of illegal content or activities, the User may contact the publisher at the following address: BartosikPatrickPro@gmail.com, or by registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt sent to the publisher at the coordinates specified in these legal notices.
